The Wurst of Times

We do what we love with relish

Price
The Dogfather The finest, imported bratwurst sausage from the foothills of the Bavarian Alps. Topped with hot German mustard and organic ketchup. £9
Dog of the Week See specials board for details or ask your server. £11
Meat? Nah, dawg (v) A mouth-watering tofudog, spiced and grilled to perfection with your choice of toppings. £7.50
